column1: The Pit Room////My husband and I really enjoyed the bbq here. We went on a Thursday around 1:30 and there was no line but the restaurant was busy. We got the beef rib
column5: elote and Mac and cheese. We really enjoyed all the dishes. The venison sausage was a bit too dry but it was something worth trying since other places we've been to didn't offer it. Â The bbq sauce was good here. It had a good sweet and tangy taste that went well with the bbq. I also really liked that the pickled veggie bar was free refill. The pickled veggies def help cut down the fatty/ meaty meal and made it more easier to eat and enjoy.
